Texts.Chs: 使用拳套时，其基础攻击力增加至110%，使用刃武时，其基础攻击力增加至120%：且随智力增长。
Texts.Eng: 110% Base Power with Fist Weapons and 120% Base Power with Glaives: Scales with Int.

Texts.Chs: 附近被击败的敌人会释放灵魂精华，其会寻找生命值较低的盟友，并立即恢复生命值。
Texts.Eng: Nearby defeated enemies release Soul Essence that seeks out allies with low Health and grants immediate Health Regeneration.

Texts.Chs: 被动：在每次攻击之前按住Shift，在物理，火，冰，电和新星之间改变喜悦的元素。
Texts.Eng: Passive: holding shift before each attack changes Rapture's element between Physical, Fire, Ice, Electric, and Nova.

Texts.Chs: 按[Special 1]召唤灵魂。 造成^orange;火系，^blue;冰系，^white;或^yellow;电系^reset;伤害以填充灵魂：充满灵魂的灵魂获得^green;+20%自身元素^red;（但-10%其他元素）^green;的抗性和+5%物理抗性^red;但-5%攻击倍乘^white;。用^magenta;新星伤害^white;击杀敌人一消除充满灵魂的攻击和抗性降低。 再按一次[Special 1]可以爆裂每个灵魂，使附近的友军获得增强效果： ^orange;火炎之魂^reset;赋予+12秒狂怒，^blue;寒冰之魂^reset;赋予+3s生命恢复，^yellow;闪电之魂^reset;+6s能量恢复。
Texts.Eng: Press [Special 1] to summon Souls. Deal ^orange;Fire, ^blue;Ice, ^white;or ^yellow;Electric ^reset;damage to fill a soul: filled souls grant ^green;+20% own Element ^red;(but -10% other Element)^green; Resistance, and +5% Physical Resistance ^red;but -5% Power Multiplier^white;. Kill a foe with ^magenta;Nova damage^white; to remove a filled soul's power and resistance reduction. Press [Special 1] again to burst each soul, granting buffs to nearby allies: +12s Rage from ^orange;Fire^reset;; +3s Health Regen from ^blue;Ice^reset;; +6s Energy Regen from ^yellow;Electric.^reset;

Texts.Chs: 主要攻击：一连串的攻击。
Texts.Eng: Primary Fire: A flurry of attacks.

Texts.Chs: 次要攻击：充满法杖深处的能量，以释放以神圣伤害消灭敌人的光束。
Texts.Eng: Secondary Fire: Charge up the energy deep within the staff to call down beams of light that scorch enemies with Holy Damage.
